name: Donquixote Rosinante
text: [Activate: Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and this Character: If your Leader is [Donquixote Rosinante], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 or less rested. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and this Character: If your Leader is [Donquixote Rosinante], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 or less rested. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
